mapper.insert: insert into module_branch_score (module_branch_score_id, stu_no, module_branch_id, point) values (#{moduleBranchScoreId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleBranchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{point,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select module_branch_score_id, stu_no, module_branch_id, point from module_branch_score
